output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: YES (CMF: 11240017) - This indicates it's electoral propaganda 2. Refers to candidate: YES - Specifically mentions "Marcel Ciolacu, candidatul nostru la Președinția României" 3. Addresses wide population: YES - It's a paid post targeting a large audience (125,000-150,000 impressions) 4. Electoral objective: YES - Clearly promotes both parliamentary candidates and Marcel Ciolacu as presidential candidate 5. Journalism: NO - This is clearly campaign communication, not journalism 6. Personal opinion: NO - This is an official party communication from PSD Maramureș
Key points: - The post is promoting both parliamentary and presidential candidates - Has significant reach with high impressions and spend - Contains explicit electoral messaging - Has official CMF number - Posted during electoral period - Specifically promotes Marcel Ciolacu as presidential candidate

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: 1. Contains official CMF number 2. Directly promotes a presidential candidate 3. Has clear electoral messaging 4. Is a paid advertisement with wide reach 5. Promotes both parliamentary and presidential campaigns 6. Contains direct call to action for voting
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Maramureș, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj electoral plătit (ID Facebook: 1307053713792365) ce conține propagandă electorală pentru candidatul prezidențial Marcel Ciolacu după încheierea perioadei de campanie. Postarea, ce include număr CMF 11240017, a fost difuzată pe Facebook și Instagram cu un buget între 1000-1499 RON și a ajuns la 125.000-150.000 de persoane, reprezentând astfel o încălcare clară a prevederilor legale privind încetarea propagandei electorale după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Mesajul conține referiri directe la candidatura prezidențială și solicită explicit sprijin electoral.
